title: DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Additional General Manager Posts
description: The Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation of India Limited (DFCCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Additional General Manager Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, MBA, and MCA can apply for the DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants...
